alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Johns, east central Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near World Golf Village, or 11 miles east of Green Cove Springs, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... World Golf Village, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, South Ponte Vedra, Nocatee, Durbin, Picolata, Guana River State Park, Vilano Beach and Bakersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns
